title: Model Explainability & Transparency Framework
abstract: This proposal introduces a comprehensive model explainability and transparency framework that provides insight into AI decision-making processes, enables interpretable governance decisions, and ensures transparent operation of all AI models within the governance system.
motivation: The governance system requires transparency and explainability in AI decision-making to ensure trust, enable accountability, and provide clear understanding of how decisions are reached by different AI models.
rationale: A comprehensive explainability framework ensures transparent governance, enables accountability in AI decisions, builds stakeholder trust, and provides necessary insight into model decision-making processes.
specification: Model explainability and transparency framework including decision explanation algorithms, transparency reporting mechanisms, interpretable governance processes, and comprehensive model behavior analysis.
benefits: Transparent AI decision-making building stakeholder trust
Model behavior analysis improving decision quality
challenges: Complex explainability implementation across diverse AI models
Performance overhead for comprehensive decision analysis
Balancing explanation detail with system responsiveness

consolidation.note: Governance framework proposal for AI transparency and explainability
